events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return the product because it does not meet my expectations and I would like a refund.
Case has been reviewed and categorized under Refund since the customer is requesting a return and money back.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. for follow-up and processing of the refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to help you with your return and refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for the return so I can assist you further?
Sure, my order number is 56783924. The product is not as described and I would prefer to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. I have initiated your refund request. Please use the prepaid return label sent to your email to send back the product.
Thanks for the quick response! I received the return label and will send the item back today.
We have received your returned product and processed a full refund to your original payment method. Please allow a few business days for it to reflect.
Just checking in to make sure your refund has been received and that you are satisfied with the resolution. Let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case now. Thank you for your patience and feel free to contact us anytime for future support.
